text: Shiv Sampati Ram is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha the lower house of Indian Parliament from Robertsganj in Uttar Pradesh as a member of the Janata Party. ==References== ==External links== *Official biographical sketch in Parliament of India website Category:6th Lok Sabha members Category:Lok Sabha members from Uttar Pradesh Category:Possibly living people Category:Year of birth missing
title: Shiv Sampati Ram
